item.title: My Publications
item.description: O.A Sabogal Cardona, D.A Escobar García, D.R Oviedo. (2018). Making accessibility visible: visualizing spatial accessibility through multi-dimensional scaling model. Modern Applied Science, Vol 12 (No 6). O.A Sabogal Cardona, J.D Hincapié, F.L Muñoz. (2018). Análisis de accesibilidad a las ciudades de Pereira y Dosquebradas, Book Chapter in “Transporte Urbano: Mirada Social y Tecnológica”. Editorial Universidad Tenológica de Pereira D.A. Escobar García, J. Montoya, O.A Sabogal Cardona (2017). ¿Dónde Ubicar nuevos nodos comerciales en la ciudad de Manizales - Colombia?

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Spatial Analysis Workshop in Uruguay - June 2019 This is a short course about using geographic data to generate maps and insights. We will see how to use the sf library to load and process data by performing spatial operations. For map-making we are going to introduce the tmap library. Also, we will see how to create interactive maps with leaflet. You can see all the content of the course
